description: Whether in the city or a small town, Rowena Ashley's son Michael has had to endure racism from a young age. This is a story about achieving against the odds. This Digital Storytelling project was created  in partnership with Arts Victoria and the Community Support Fund.
part_of_compliation_title_or_vod_package: Compilation title; B2000892; Stories from Gippsland : Digital Storytelling project; Active; 2007
